<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

Зализняка — 11*<a href = vnd.unilang:b.html>b</a>.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — обшива́ть.

***обшлаг.html

Какие-то <a href = vnd.unilang:невероятный.html>невероя́тные</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:нашивка.html>наши́вки</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>него́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:обшлаг.html>обшлаге́</a></span>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9C%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B3%D0%BE%D1%84,_%D0%90%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B9_%D0%91%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Мариенгоф, Анатолий Борисович"><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Б. Мариенгоф</a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:роман.html>Рома́н</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:без.html>без</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вранье.html>вранья́</a>», <span class="example-date">1927</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:отворот.html>отворо́т</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:манжета.html>манже́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:брюки.html>брю́ках</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:вчера.html>Вчера́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>был</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:диво.html>ди́во</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ветреный.html>ве́треный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:день.html>день</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пойти.html>пошёл</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:читальный.html>чита́льный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:зал.html>зал</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a> какими-то <a href = vnd.unilang:зеленый.html>зелёными</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:нитка.html>ни́тками</a> подшивал <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; <h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>

***общак.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:общак.html>обща́к</a> (29818)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общак.html>обща́к</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">obščák</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общак.html>общака́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общак.html>общаки́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общак.html>общако́в</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:slang.html>slang</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:common.html>common</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:fund.html>fund</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:criminal.html>criminal</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:group.html>group</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:mob.html>mob</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:money.html>money</a>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:об.html>об</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ща́к</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3b  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-общ-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ак</b>.

***общаться.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:общаться.html>обща́ться</a> (3958)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb"><a href = vnd.unilang:verb.html>Verb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общаться.html>обща́ться</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">obščátʹsja</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:пообщаться.html>пообща́ться</a></b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">общну́ться</b>)
</p>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:об.html>об</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ща́ть<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ся</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,  <a href = vnd.unilang:возвратный.html>возвра́тный</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — общнуться.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-общ-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b>; постфикс: <b>-ся</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***общающийся.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:общаться.html>обща́ющийся</a> (3958)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Participle"><a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>Participle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общаться.html>обща́ющийся</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">obščájuščijsja</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:present.html>present</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:active.html>active</a> imperfective <a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>participle</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общаться.html>обща́ться</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">obščátʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:общаться.html>обща́ющийся</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:причастие.html>Прича́стие</a>.

</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><i>действ. прич. <a href = vnd.unilang:наст.html>наст</a>. вр.</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:общаться.html>обща́ться</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>

***общедоступный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:общедоступный.html>общедосту́пный</a> (25751)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общедоступный.html>общедосту́пный</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">obščedostúpnyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:available.html>available</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:everybody.html>everybody</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:об.html>об</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ще<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:до.html>до</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ступа.html>сту́п</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-общ-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-е-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-доступ-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:порядочный.html>-н</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:доступный.html>досту́пный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:для.html>для</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>всех</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:доступный.html>досту́пный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:для.html>для</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>всех</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:цена.html>цене́</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:дешевый.html>дешёвый</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:вполне.html>вполне́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:понятный.html>поня́тный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:для.html>для</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>всех</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:простой.html>просто́й</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ясный.html>я́сный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:содержание.html>содержа́нию</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рме</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:изложение.html>изложе́нию</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li></ol>

***общежитие.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:общежитие.html>общежи́тие</a> (3334)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>о́бщий</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">óbščij</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:common.html>common</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жить.html>жить</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">žitʹ</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:live.html>live</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ие</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общежитие.html>общежи́тие</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">obščežítije</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общежитие.html>общежи́тия</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общежитие.html>общежи́тия</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общежитие.html>общежи́тий</a></b>)

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:об.html>об</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ще<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>жи́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ти.html>ти</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>е</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 7a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-общ-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-е-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-жи-</b>; суффикс: <b>-тиj</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:dan.html>-е</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

***общеизвестный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:общеизвестный.html>общеизве́стный</a> (19216)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>о́бщий</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">óbščij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-е-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-e-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:известный.html>изве́стный</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">izvéstnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общеизвестный.html>общеизве́стный</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">obščeizvéstnyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:generally.html>generally</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:know.html>known</a>, well-known
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:общеизвестный.html>общеизве́стные</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:факт.html>фа́кты</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>obščeizvéstnyje</b> fákty</i> ― <span class="e-translation">well-known [<a href = vnd.unilang:generally.html>generally</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:know.html>known</a>] facts</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>о́бщий</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">óbščij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:община.html>о́бщина</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">óbščina</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:община.html>общи́на</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">obščína</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общинный.html>общи́нный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">obščínnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общение.html>обще́ние</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">obščénije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:об.html>об</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ще<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:вест.html>ве́ст</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-общ-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-е-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-известн-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:известный.html>Известный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>всем</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>национа́льный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nacionálʹnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальность.html>национа́льность</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nacionálʹnostʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:нация.html>на́ция</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nácija</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:национализм.html>национали́зм</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nacionalízm</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:националист.html>национали́ст</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nacionalíst</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:националистический.html>националисти́ческий</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nacionalistíčeskij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">национализи́ровать</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nacionalizírovatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:национализация.html>национализа́ция</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nacionalizácija</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>о̀б<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ще<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ци<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>на́ль<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-общ-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-е-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-наци-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-он-</b>; суффикс: <b>-альн</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>

***общение.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:общение.html>обще́ние</a> (3163)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общение.html>обще́ние</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">obščénije</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общение.html>обще́ния</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общение.html>обще́ния</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общение.html>обще́ний</a></b>)
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:об.html>об</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ще́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>ни</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>е</b>

Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-общ-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ениj</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:dan.html>-е</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

***общеобразовательный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:общеобразовательный.html>общеобразовательный</a> (30430)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>о̀б<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ще<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:об.html>об</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ра<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>зо<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ва́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тель<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>

Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-общ-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-е-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-образова-</b>; суффикс: <b>-тельн</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:об.html>об</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ще<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:питый.html>пи́т</a></b>

Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-общ-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-е-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-пит-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:общероссийский.html>общеросси́йский</a> (24898)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:об.html>об</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ще<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:расти.html>ро́с</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>си́й<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ский</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 3a✕~.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-общ-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-е-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-росс-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-ий-ск</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ий</b>.
</p>

<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>о́бщий</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">óbščij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:община.html>о́бщина</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">óbščina</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:община.html>общи́на</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">obščína</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общинный.html>общи́нный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">obščínnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общение.html>обще́ние</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">obščénije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:об.html>об</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ще́ст<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:вена.html>ве́н</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:но.html>но</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:наречие.html>Наре́чие</a>; неизменяемое.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ball.html>--</a></b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><i>нареч.</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:общественный.html>обще́ственный</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:точка.html>то́чки</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:зрение.html>зре́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:общество.html>о́бщества</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:учет.html>учётом</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:интерес.html>интере́сов</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:общество.html>о́бщества</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

</ol>

***общественный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:общественный.html>обще́ственный</a> (1171)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общество.html>о́бщество</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">óbščestvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-енный</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ennyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общественный.html>обще́ственный</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">obščéstvennyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:social.html>social</a></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:public.html>public</a></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:common.html>common</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms"><a href = vnd.unilang:synonym.html>Synonyms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:коллективный.html>коллекти́вный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">kollektívnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>о́бщий</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">óbščij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:социальный.html>социа́льный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">sociálʹnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общественность.html>обще́ственность</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">obščéstvennostʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общество.html>о́бщество</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">óbščestvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общение.html>обще́ние</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">obščénije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общность.html>о́бщность</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">óbščnostʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>о́бщий</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">óbščij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общаться.html>обща́ться</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">obščátʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:обобщать.html>обобща́ть</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">obobščátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">обобществлять</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">obobščestvljatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:об.html>об</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ще́ст<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:вена.html>ве́н</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>.
<a href = vnd.unilang:встречаться.html>Встреча́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>также</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вариант.html>вариа́нт</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:схема.html>схе́ме</a> 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>(1) (кратк. <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рма</a> муж. р. <i>обществен</i>).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-общ-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-е-ств-енн</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***общество.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:общество.html>о́бщество</a> (450)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>Borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Church_Slavonic" class="extiw" title="w:Old Church Slavonic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:church.html>Church</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavonic.html>Slavonic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="cu">обьщьство</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="cu-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">obĭštĭstvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>; <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>see</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>о́бщий</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">óbščij</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:common.html>common</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ество</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-estvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. Cognates <a href = vnd.unilang:include.html>include</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bulgarian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Bulgarian language"><a href = vnd.unilang:bulgarian.html>Bulgarian</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="bg"><a href = vnd.unilang:общество.html>о́бщество</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="bg-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">óbštestvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Macedonian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Macedonian language"><a href = vnd.unilang:macedonian.html>Macedonian</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="mk">општество</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="mk-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">opštestvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:об.html>о́б</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ще<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ство</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-общ-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-е-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ств</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-о</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-общ-</b>; суффикс: <b>-еств</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-о</b>  | Кузнецова, Ефремова, 1986 | .

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:об.html>об</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ще<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>че<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ло<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ве́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>че<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ский</b>

Зализняка — 3a✕~.

***общий.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>о́бщий</a> (262)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>Borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Church_Slavonic" class="extiw" title="w:Old Church Slavonic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:church.html>Church</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavonic.html>Slavonic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="cu">обьщь</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="cu-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">obĭštĭ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*obьťь</i>. <a href = vnd.unilang:doublet.html>Doublet</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">о́бчий</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">óbčij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:inherit.html>inherited</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:east.html>East</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavic.html>Slavic</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:form.html>form</a>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>о́бщий</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">óbščij</span>) (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:comparative.html>comparative</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)<a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>обще́е</a></b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)<a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>обще́й</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:common.html>common</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>У</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>нас</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>о́бщий</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>язы́к</a>.</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:u.html>U</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:nas.html>nas</a> <b>óbščij</b> jazýk.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:we.html>We</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:share.html>share</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:common.html>common</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:language.html>language</a>.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>У</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>нас</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>о́бщий</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:интерес.html>интере́с</a>.</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:u.html>U</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:nas.html>nas</a> <b>óbščij</b> interés.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:we.html>We</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:have.html>have</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:common.html>common</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:interest.html>interest</a>.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:public.html>public</a></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:total.html>total</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:whole.html>whole</a></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:general.html>general</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>о́бщих</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:черта.html>черта́х</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:v.html>v</a> <b>óbščix</b> čertáx</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:roughly.html>roughly</a> / <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:general.html>general</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:way.html>way</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>о́бщем</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:v.html>v</a> óbščem</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:all.html>all</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:all.html>all</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:by.html>by</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:large.html>large</a>, generically, <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:general.html>general</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:on.html>on</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:whole.html>whole</a></span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:grammar.html>grammar</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:common.html>common</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>о́бщий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">óbščij <a href = vnd.unilang:rod.html>rod</a></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:common.html>common</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:gender.html>gender</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:genus.html>genus</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:commune.html>commune</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:об.html>о́б</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>щий</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 4a/<a href = vnd.unilang:c.html>c</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>Сравни́тельная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пень</a> — <i><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>обще́е</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>обще́й</a>, пообще́е, пообще́й.</i>
<a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>значе́нии</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:отвлечь.html>отвлечённый</a>, неконкретный» кратк. <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рма</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:образоваться.html>образу́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:образец.html>образцу́</a> 4a/<a href = vnd.unilang:b.html>b</a>': <i>общо</a>́</i>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>обща́</a></i>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>общи́</a></i>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-общ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ий</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<li><a href = vnd.unilang:отвлечь.html>отвлечённый</a>, неконкретный <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:подозревать.html>подозрева́ю</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>всё</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:говорить.html>говорю́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:теперь.html>тепе́рь</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:так.html>так</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:похожий.html>похо́же</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:самый.html>са́мые</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; <ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:совместный.html>совме́стный</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:коллективный.html>коллекти́вный</a></li>

</body> 
***община.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:община.html>община</a> (6341)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>о́бщий</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">óbščij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-и́на</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ína</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> (suffix-stressed) <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>о́бщий</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">óbščij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ина</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ina</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> (stem-stressed).
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:община.html>общи́на</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">obščína</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:община.html>общи́ны</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:община.html>общи́ны</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:община.html>общи́н</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:commune.html>commune</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:collective.html>collective</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:society.html>society</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:primitive.html>primitive</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:often.html>often</a> clan-based, <a href = vnd.unilang:society.html>society</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:collective.html>collective</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ownership.html>ownership</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:mean.html>means</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:production.html>production</a></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:religion.html>religion</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:community.html>community</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:believer.html>believers</a></li></ol>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:община.html>общи́на</a></strong> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:община.html>о́бщина</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">obščína</span> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">óbščina</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:община.html>общи́ны</a></b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:община.html>о́бщины</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:община.html>общи́ны</a></b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:община.html>о́бщины</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:община.html>общи́н</a></b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:община.html>о́бщин</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:community.html>community</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:об.html>о́б</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:щи.html>щи</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:об.html>об</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:щи.html>щи́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-общ-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ин</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="историческое">истор.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рма</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:организация.html>организа́ции</a> первобытнообщинного <a href = vnd.unilang:общество.html>о́бщества</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:полный.html>по́лным</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:либо.html>ли́бо</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:частичный.html>части́чным</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:самоуправление.html>самоуправле́нием</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:коллективный.html>коллекти́вным</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ведение.html>ведением</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:хозяйство.html>хозя́йства</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:relational.html>relational</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:commune.html>commune</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:collective.html>collective</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:society.html>society</a></li>

<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общаться.html>обща́ться</a></span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">obščátʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:пообщаться.html>пообща́ться</a></span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect"><a href = vnd.unilang:pf.html>pf</a></abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">poobščátʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общительный.html>общи́тельный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">obščítelʹnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">общи́тельность</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">obščítelʹnostʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общество.html>о́бщество</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">óbščestvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общественный.html>обще́ственный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">obščéstvennyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общественность.html>обще́ственность</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">obščéstvennostʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общественник.html>обще́ственник</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">obščéstvennik</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:общинный.html>общи́нный</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-общ-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-ин-н</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:sociable.html>sociable</a> (tending <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:socialize.html>socialize</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>be</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:social.html>social</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:friendly.html>friendly</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:inviting.html>inviting</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:congenial.html>congenial</a>)</li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:об.html>об</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:щи.html>щи́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тель<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>

Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>Сравни́тельная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пень</a> — <i>общи́тельнее, общи́тельней.</i>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-общ-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-и-тельн</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>о́бщий</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">óbščij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ность</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nostʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>

<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>о́бщий</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">óbščij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:общество.html>о́бщество</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">óbščestvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сообщество.html>соо́бщество</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">soóbščestvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:общий.html>о́бщ</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ность</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 3-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 8a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-общ-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-н-ость</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>объ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>е<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ди.html>ди</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>нён<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p>Страдательное <a href = vnd.unilang:причастие.html>прича́стие</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:прошедший.html>проше́дшего</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:время.html>вре́мени</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>/<a href = vnd.unilang:b.html>b</a>(2).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>объ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-един-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ённ</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***объединение.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:объединение.html>объедине́ние</a> (5247)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:объединить.html>объедини́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">obʺjedinítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-е́ние</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-énije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:объединение.html>объедине́ние</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">obʺjedinénije</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:объединение.html>объедине́ния</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:объединение.html>объедине́ния</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:объединение.html>объедине́ний</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:association.html>association</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:union.html>union</a></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:unification.html>unification</a></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:military.html>military</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> refers <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:major.html>major</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:combine.html>combined</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:field.html>field</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:force.html>force</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:such.html>such</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:as.html>as</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:front.html>front</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:an.html>an</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:army.html>army</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:group.html>group</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:literally.html>literally</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:unification.html>unification</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:amalgamation.html>amalgamation</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:integration.html>integration</a>)</li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>объ<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>е<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ди.html>ди</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>ни</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>е</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 7a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>объ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-един-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ениj</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:dan.html>-е</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
